com.cscguru.client.interfaces

Interface IClickable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundBox, Button, Camera, Gui, Inventory, InventoryBox, Mob

    public interface IClickable
    Provides a way to interact with mouse events.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkMouseClick(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f v, int button)
      Provides a way to check to see if the mouse has clicked the object.
      boolean checkMouseHover(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f v)
      Provides a way to check to see if the mouse is over the object.
